name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nissan GTR R34 Japanese Neon Street A Thrilling Live Wallpaper for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rev up your Chrome experience with the Nissan GTR R34 Japanese Neon Street live wallpaper, where speed and style collide.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring your Chrome to life with neon lights featuring a Nissan GTR R34! Enjoy seamless browsing with this extension that includes shortcuts to popular websites and Google Search. Happy browsing!
